tidbits.title: Island Paradise
tidbits.description: Maldives is an idyllic island paradise, known for its crystal-clear turquoise waters, white sandy beaches, and vibrant marine life.

tidbits.title: Overwater Bungalows
tidbits.description: The country is famous for luxurious overwater bungalows, offering a unique and luxurious way to experience the beauty of the ocean.

tidbits.title: Marine Conservation
tidbits.description: Maldives is committed to marine conservation, with efforts to protect coral reefs, diverse marine species, and sustainable tourism practices.
